forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens over Downtown San Francisco, a light mist begins to unfurl its subtle tendrils through the city streets, whispering promises of an overnight drizzle. The temperatures hover gently around 59 degrees, with a cool west-southwest wind brushing past, a reminder of the city’s maritime charms. Those venturing out tonight may appreciate a light jacket or sweater, perhaps complemented by an umbrella stowed just in case.

As dawn approaches on Saturday, the promise of another day emerges, marked by patches of early drizzle giving way to a soft embrace of sunshine. With temperatures set to rise near 67 degrees, and a brisk wind carrying scents from the bay, one might find delight in a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a café visit, where the buzz of conversation mingles with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee. The day holds the allure of exploration under partly cloudy skies, perfect for wandering the trails of Golden Gate Park or soaking in the sights from one of the city’s many viewpoints, as a hint of marine layer dances along the edges of the horizon.
